senses.sense_definition: A very small hole or puncture, typically made for medical or scientific purposes.

examples.text: The surgeon used a special kit to create a <w>micropuncture</w> in the vein.
Researchers analyzed the <w>micropuncture</w> on the cell wall under a microscope.

senses.sense_definition: To make a very small hole or puncture in something.

examples.text: The technician had to <w>micropuncture</w> the membrane carefully to inject the dye.
They designed a robot to <w>micropuncture</w> delicate tissues without causing damage.
